Najah:

"Thanksssss to don't leave me there, Masssster" replied Najah while=
 he tried to be on line..."I think that I'll need a big improvement sssson =
if I don't like that The maxi-junk ssskin me alive"

e -----

ursday, May 10, 2001 11:30 PM

  Fixing the=
 cooler, fixing the car, fixing the comp... It never ends!

  Jen and I are=
 doing some exchanging of chars, so the Galaxors are now
  hers, but I thin=
k she's giving me Cledar, Forrior, Blyer, and Rixer.
  I'm not sure, but sh=
e'll confirm this in her next post. Also,
  Reptilica, Bloodystrike, and Pe=
rndabot are now War Barge's, so he can
  start controlling them whenever.

=
  ::EndBringer/Demise/Zardus/The Lavacons::

  EndBringer ignores the laser=
 blast as it hit him in the back,
  continuing to send electricity through =
Double Punch. He recieves an
  order from Killfest over the 
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Demise is hit by 10 shots and falls back, roaring i=
n rage.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardus manages to avoid the s=
hots flying for him and continues toward
  the Iron Fist when he recieves a=
 message from Wolfgang. He would have
  been surprised, but his and FZs min=
ds shared most of their thoughts,
  so he knew that Wolfgang had come back,=
 though he didn't know that he
  came to the battle.

  "Welcome back, Wolf=
gang," he replies. Despite wanting power for
  himself, he didn't mind Wolf=
gang coming back too much. The two had
  been partners back in the early da=
ys. "We're heading back for Alliance
  island. If you also go there, I will=
 meet you as soon as I arrive."

  He also sends a message to the Galactors=
, telling them to stay and
  battle for a while.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~
  The Lavacons follow Zardus, Astral frowning about where Fenox h=
ad been
  the entire battle.
